CustomField.description: Creating a field to be used in the flow to name the object itself, was: LEFT(Account__r.Name, 7) & " - " & "PartnerManagment" This field should be hidden, and have updated the formula since going live, was "PartnerMgmt" & " - " & College_or_Business__r.Name last update Feb 1 (Easton)
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Created for the flow to rename the object itself
CustomField.label: PM Name formula
